extends java.lang.AutoCloseable

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <E extends java.lang.Exception> 
      void      		 throwCaught(java.lang.Class<E> pCatchable)
      If the implementation has already encountered and caught a Throwable that is subclass of the argument throw it now.

    • Method Detail

      • throwCaught

        <E extends java.lang.Exception> void throwCaught(java.lang.Class<E> pCatchable)
                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        If the implementation has already encountered and caught a Throwable that is subclass of the argument throw it now.
        Parameters:
        pCatchable - a type that the client of the implementation can handle if thrown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
